name: For Noah EP
description:
For Noah – grown to a five piece band by now – brings pure, melancholic pop melodies and is influenced by champions in the music industry like Bon Iver, Nick Drake, and Sigur Rós. 

For Noah proudly present their first EP. This debut release makes a lasting impression and was recorded at the Galloway Studio (Netherlands), produced by John Morand (Sparklehorse, Joan Osborne, …) and mixed by Morand and Alan Weatherhead (Daniel Johnston, Sparklehorse, …). Peerless’s Jeff Lipton (Bon Iver, Buffalo Tom, Andrew Bird, …) took on the mastering and great people like Graham Lee (The Triffids) and Reggie Pace (Bon Iver’s trombonist) make noteworthy guest appearances.

This product contains a For Noah EP digipak.
